entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 06 January 2023
